# AllCare - Payment App Integration Project

## Project Overview
Next.js application for payment integration with backend-first approach.

## Technology Stack
- Next.js (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Backend API routes for payment processing

## Development Status
- [x] Project structure created
- [x] Backend API routes scaffolded
- [x] Payment API endpoints created
- [x] Type definitions added
- [ ] Payment integration implemented
- [ ] Database configured
- [ ] Testing setup

## API Endpoints
- `POST /api/payments` - 결제 요청
- `GET /api/payments?orderId=xxx` - 결제 조회
- `POST /api/payments/webhook` - 결제 웹훅 처리
- `GET /api/health` - 헬스체크

## Project Guidelines
- Focus on backend API development first
- Payment app integration ready
- TypeScript for type safety
- API-first architecture
